scripts.private-network: ganache-cli -e 1000000 -l 10000000 -m "guitar edit involve comic viable when gossip tail organ draw route blush solution strike bubble" --time 1970-01-01T00:00:00Z
scripts.private-network-no-limit: ganache-cli -i 80001 --chainId 80001 -e 1000000 --allowUnlimitedContractSize -l 10000000 -m "guitar edit involve comic viable when gossip tail organ draw route blush solution strike bubble" --time 1970-01-01T00:00:00Z
scripts.private-network-no-limit-bsc: ganache-cli -i 80002 --chainId 80002 -e 1000000 --allowUnlimitedContractSize -l 10000000 -m "guitar edit involve comic viable when gossip tail organ draw route blush solution strike bubble" --time 1970-01-01T00:00:00Z
scripts.private-network-no-limit-pol: ganache-cli -i 80003 --chainId 80003 -e 1000000 --allowUnlimitedContractSize -l 10000000 -m "guitar edit involve comic viable when gossip tail organ draw route blush solution strike bubble" --time 1970-01-01T00:00:00Z
scripts.private-network-quiet: ganache-cli -e 1000000 -l 10000000 -m "guitar edit involve comic viable when gossip tail organ draw route blush solution strike bubble" --time 1970-01-01T00:00:00Z --quiet
scripts.private-network-quiet-fork: ganache-cli -e 1000000 -l 10000000 -m "guitar edit involve comic viable when gossip tail organ draw route blush solution strike bubble" --time 1970-01-01T00:00:00Z --quiet --fork wss://mainnet.infura.io/ws/v3/$(grep PROJECT_ID .env | cut -d '"' -f2)
scripts.private-network-rinkeby-fork: ganache-cli -e 1000000 -l 10000000 -m "guitar edit involve comic viable when gossip tail organ draw route blush solution strike bubble" --time 1970-01-01T00:00:00Z --quiet --fork wss://rinkeby.infura.io/ws/v3/$(grep PROJECT_ID .env | cut -d '"' -f2)
scripts.test-all: npm run deploy-dev && truffle test --compile-none --migrations_directory test
scripts.lint-fix: npm run lint-sol-fix && npm run lint-js-fix && npm run lint-json-fix
scripts.lint-check: npm run lint-sol-check && npm run lint-js-check && npm run lint-json-check
